reviews.review_msg: Antone is a really good prof to have for 100 level English classes because he really knows how to ease people into reading a ton of material regularly. He starts off with easy small texts and works his ways up. He is also really good at leading discussion and makes it easy to pick out what you want to write about for your papers.
Antone is really nice and approachable and definitely helps you out. However, he is a tough marker so make sure you ask for feedback because it'll help you understand what he is looking for.
